body:
hi again,  i've partially solved the issue. the error still appears but at least it works most of the time. I'm sharing this with you maybe it is useful for others now i'm working locally out of the UNI network and also saves the work on a local drive and make sure you are running everything as administrator and you have full access to read/write/modify everything in DAYSIM folder on C drive. as a precaution, i did the same for radiance, E+ and open studio 

this error message still appears every now and then but eventually, i can redo the faulty runs  regards  anas
